name: Murkrow
author: Hironobu Yoshida
flavor_text: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon card named Murkrow and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward. (You can’t use this attack if your Bench is full.)

attacks.name: Flock Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a number of coins equal to the number of Murkrows on your Bench. This attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.
